``` java A new Class http://java.net Java.net

public class TestClass {

   private static TestClass instance;

   private TestClass {
           // Do something
   }

   public static TestClass getInstance() {
          if (instance == null) {
             instance = new  TestClass();
          }
          return instance;
   }

}
```
